attributes.action: repeal the legislation preventing people taking photographs in public places and hence begin to return this country's long tradition and culture of civil liberty which this government is totally out of tune with and clearly does not understand
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The article in the Guardian on 17th April (which I'm not allowed to link to it seems) describing an incident in which two Austrian tourists were forced by the police to delete photographs they had taken of a bus station in London really serves to illustrate the point without many further words being required.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
